wikipoints-mostpoints-rank: Label for the table header of the rank column
wikipoints-mostpoints-username: Label for the table header of the username column
wikipoints-mostpoints-wikipoints: Label for the table header of the WiiPoints column
wikipoints-user-has: Text showing the amount of wikipoints a user has. $1 is the username, $2 the amounts of wikipoints
wikipoints-user-nonexistent: Text shown when the provided user doesn't exist. $1 is the username
